pre-task.applicable-cars: C Car, S Car, T Car

hazard.hazard-desc: If the test determines that corrective maintenance is required, report it to your supervisor to ensure that proper corrective action is taken.
Some of the following steps require additional personnel on train.

step.para: From cab, ensure NJ Transit standard coach key is not present in Master Door Control Panel MDCP1 COMMUNICATIONS key switch so that MDCP1 is not activated.
Ensure Master Controller Reverser is set to I (Isolate) to deactivate cab.
Using NJ Transit standard coach key, turn any one cab Communication Control Panel (CCP) rotary selector switch to position PA.
Momentarily press PEI panel (1) PUSH TO CALL pushbutton (2) and verify the following:

list-item.para: Activated CCP PEI ACTIVATED LED indicator blinks (green).
PEI chime is played over all train interior speakers for 2 seconds.
All train Interior Message Signs IMS1 to IMS6 display the PEI call message for 2 minutes.

step.para: Using NJ Transit standard coach key, turn activated CCP rotary selector switch to position PEI. Ensure CCP PEI ACTIVATED LED indicator is ON (green) and PEI activity LED indicator (3) is ON (green).
Press and hold Activated CCP PUSH TO TALK pushbutton and speak near CCP microphone grill array. Ensure CCP microphone audio is heard and clearly understood over PEI speaker (4).
Release Activated CCP PUSH TO TALK pushbutton and speak near CCP microphone grill array. Ensure CCP microphone audio is no longer heard on PEI speaker (4).
Speak near PEI microphone grill (4). Ensure PEI microphone audio is heard and clearly understood over activated CCP speaker.

Using NJ Transit standard coach key, turn activated CCP rotary selector switch to position IC or PA to place PEI panel (1) call on hold. Ensure CCP PEI ACTIVATED LED indicator is ON (yellow) and PEI activity LED indicator (3) is ON (yellow).
Speak near PEI microphone grill (4). Ensure PEI microphone audio is not heard on activated CCP.

Using NJ Transit standard coach key, turn activated CCP rotary selector switch to position PEI. Ensure Activated CCP PEI ACTIVATED LED indicator is ON (green) and PEI activity LED indicator (3) is ON (green).
Speak near PEI microphone grill (4). Ensure PEI microphone audio is heard on activated CCP.

Using NJ Transit standard coach key, turn activated CCP rotary selector switch to position OFF to cancel PEI call. Ensure CCP1 PEI ACTIVATED LED indicator is OFF and PEI activity LED indicator (3) is OFF.
Speak near PEI microphone grill (4). Ensure PEI microphone audio is not heard on activated CCP.
If testing toilet PEI (PEI5, in C Cars and S Cars), exercise External Push-to-call (EPTC) pushbutton associated with PEI5.
